attributes.action: Every company should have a public carbon zero policy document.
attributes.additional_details:
This is in response to and support of #extinctionrebellion and the declarations of #climateemergency across the country.

The carbon zero policy needs to be open to public scrutiny otherwise it will be worthless.
attributes.background: Every company to focus on doing their bit towards a carbon neutral world.  Like data protection, health & safety documents every company should be obliged in law to have a carbon zero officer responsible their carbon zero policy.
